```
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-28.5, y=-61.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=-27.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-27.5, y=-61.5)

### Copper smelting at position(x=15.0, y=-70.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=15.0, y=-70.0)

### Iron smelting at position(x=5.0, y=-70.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=5.0, y=-70.0)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are craftable before attempting to craft a complex item. In this case, iron-plate is needed to craft iron-gear-wheel, which is needed to craft automation-science-pack.
- Make sure you have the necessary machines to craft the items. The error message indicates that iron-plate requires a crafting machine or smelting in a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. The error message indicates that there was no iron-ore in the inventory when attempting to insert it into the stone furnace.

# NAMESPACE
### Utility Functions:
None

### Variables:
None
```
